author: mikemccand
msg: LUCENE-2597: add SlowMultiReaderWrapper to make a composite reader act like an atomic one

author: ffang
msg: [KARAF-140] Modifying properties and saving them via the Config Console removes comments in the original file

author: norman
msg: Introduce a SearchQueryIterator which can handle the SearchQuery matching lazy. I also changed the Mapper to return only an Iterator with the uids of the found messages so its easier to write an implementation specific implementation whith an optimized performance (IMAP-190)
